Class Piles

  • java.lang.Object
    • Piles

  • public class Piles
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the four piles in the FreeCell game with suit c, d, h, s. The four piles can be accessed using their respective suit. The add method follows the rules of the game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Piles()
      Creates four piles with suit c, d, h, s.

    • Method Summary

      Returns the specified pile.
      java.lang.String toString()

      boolean win()
      Returns true if and only if the game is solved.

    • Method Detail

      • getPile

        public OrderedStack<Card> getPile(java.lang.String suit)
        Returns the specified pile.
        Parameters:
        suit - suit of the pile.
        Returns:
        the specified pile.

      • add

        public void add(Card c,
                java.lang.String suit)
         throws InvalidMoveException,
                InvalidPileException
        Add a card into the end of the specified pile. These rules must be followed: 1. The suit of the card to be pushed and the key of orderedStack must match 2. The face value of the card to be pushed must one point bigger than the card on the top of this orderedStack.
        Parameters:
        c - the card to add into the specified pile.
        suit - suit of the pile.
        Throws:
        InvalidMoveException - If the specified card is added without following the rules.
        InvalidPileException - If the specified card's suit does not match the specified pile's suit.

      • win

        public boolean win()
        Returns true if and only if the game is solved.
        Returns:
        true if and only if the game is solved; false otherwise.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns the string representation of this pile. The format is "Pile " + key + ": " + OrderedStack + "\n".
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a string representation of this piles.
